title: [Large-scale] Designing Educational Continuity and Humanization Strategies via E-learning: Social Relationship Strengthening Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy, elementary education practical experience, foundational understanding of social interaction and educational systems
context.additional_context: In smartphone-limited environments, strengthens digital competencies of elementary education practitioners while developing human-centered instructional design capabilities through social relationship building and cultural diversity considerations.

learning_goals: Participants can analyze core elements of e-learning technological infrastructure and design socially grounded strategies for educational sustainability
Participants can apply digital educational materials and pedagogies that foster learner engagement, constructing humanized learning environments and enhancing civic competency
Participants can utilize focus group discussion techniques to derive e-learning improvement plans reflecting learner needs and cultural contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
